Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: So i am waiting for them to port that functionality from mm 1.0 to mm 2.0 then my devs can start porting hyperdex over. I dont think there should be too big of a delay between mm 2.0 being 100% ready and when hyperDEX can use it

Author: CoinKing88#1540
Content: @hyperDEX Okay thanks, atomicdex uses the barterdex asset also in the backend(DEX)?

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: Yes so atomicDEX is the mobile GUI the KMD team created

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: So it will be part of the DEX asset

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: The back end uses the new mm2.0 which is the upgrade of mm1.0 which was used by barterDEX and hyperDEX

Author: CoinKing88#1540

Content: haha

Author: Regnar#6164
Content: Hey @hyperDEX so what's the word on porting over to MM2? Do you guys have a rough timeline for when you can start/finished?

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content:
@Regnar Unfortunately there were some miscommunications surrounding how our GUI was built and what functionalities mm2.0 requires for it to be a easy port. Unfortunately it is more work but i have asked Sindre to look into. No ETA at the moment as  there seems to be a few things we have to change with the current interface.

We will try to get it out ASAP

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: Hi All, we are porting hyperDEX to mm 2.0. We have very early builds out https://github.com/atomiclabs/hyperdex-nightlies/releases/tag/v0.0.0-c2d7531-19.7.24.1745

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: If you are adventurous give it a go and report any issues you may find. This is early so may not be good for grandmas just yet.

Content: When it crashes it clears all the other order @allbits and only keeps the ones in progress

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: But that is something we will work on, recover from crashes "gracefully"

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: @miles  you mean fees or the rate? The mm2.0 team need to create a new API that gives accurate numbers, then we dont need the small % margin of error. Say i was to buy something listed for 0.1, when you click on it, our DEX might sell it for 0.09 instead. This was due to the mm1.0 needing this error margin. It will still execute at 0.1 though

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: @Acura cancel is one of the things that has changed and we need to work on. If you want to cancel orders for now, just close the GUI

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: It will cancel everything that has not started.

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: Yes for now it is just nightly, we want to make sure it is stable then we will do a official release.
